Cherrycake\HttpCache::Init

Init

Method to call statically to perform Http cache control and send the proper headers

    Signature

    public function Init(int $lastModifiedTimestamp, [boolean $maxAge = false] )

    Parameters

    $lastModifiedTimestamp — int
    The timestamp to mark this request with, i.e: Last modified timestamp
    $maxAge — boolean
    The maximum age of this request in seconds, defaults to CACHE_TTL_LONGEST
